column4: Does anybody know why when i use sudo i get error unable to resolve host but it still brings up the password input and allows me in root
you played with your /etc/hosts or /etc/hostname and wrecked your host's self name-resolution
i thought it was my fault i idea on how i should go about fixing it
make sure there is a line in /etc/hosts mapping your hostname properly to 127.0.1.1 as well as a line mapping localhost to 127.0.0.1
